findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: executes transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: allow a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account

findings.title: permit
findings.description: External permit function has been marked as a potential security risk.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The 'mint' function is marked as external and has no access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: The swap functions are not properly protected and can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any access modifiers or protection mechanisms, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access and potential reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor of HarunoInu does not initialize its state variables.
